::Feline::

She looked up at Firearm. She had a pained look on her face. "I'm 
sorry to intrude, but could I please use your CR." She tried to take 
a step but her leg gave out and she fell.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Firearm::
> 
> Zardus leans back from the femm he was reprogramming, recieving 
both of 
> Skulletron's transmissions. He taps his wrist comp, checking his 
position. He 
> was nearing the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> Zardus smiles, turning back to continue working on the femm.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm glances at a console on his way to the CR chambers, 
noticing that 
> there was someone at the entrance to the CF. He sighs. His repairs 
would have 
> to wait.
> 
> Firearm looks down at himself. His interior repairs have taken care 
of most 
> of the outer damage, and he was no longer leaking feul. But he 
wouldn't last 
> long in a fight.
> 
> He retraces his steps, walking up to Feline and looking at her 
wounds. "Are 
> you allright?" he asks her, his eyes sliding over her curves.
